it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerVisitor, TimerCallback

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerVisitor, TimerCallback
    Class that implements the ControllerVisitor for execute the event that the view produced
    Author:
    Matteo Formentin, Luca Genoni

        public void endGame()
        Method used to end the game. It stop the game run by the gameboard and send the event to the view.

        Method used to set the game for a player when he made a RElogin.

      • sendInitCommand

        public void sendInitCommand()
        Method used to set the initial game. It show the initial cards to the player and ask the player to choose the window pattern card.
